page.title: 07RUSHDEN SPORTS CENTRE
page.content:
The centre is quite popular and 100 000 adults and 50 000 children use it every year.The centre is open from 9.00am. until 11.00pm.These sports are available: squash, table tennis, basketball, volleyball, indoor cricket, badminton, multi-gym, football, fencing, rollerskating, netball, judo, gymnastics, karate, archery and tennis.
The centre has 2000 members.There aren't many accidents.Sometimes there is a cut over the eye or a cut lip. There have been one or two broken arms. A single adult has to pay 660p per year and a family pays 1230p. There is a large gym,five squash courts and outside there are three tennis courts.
